overview: Cake Batter: Jakers´ mom bakes pies so delicious that no one can resist them, not even when my mom says that it is forbidden to touch them.  Fishing: Jakers´ Dad on a fishing trip, and your friends will love to be with. But first they must prove that they are large enough to nocturnal adventure.  A brush goblin is loose: The gang is looking for an angry wimp, but right under exploration is the unfortunate and shatters a window. Quickly they decide to blame the wimp. But is he real?  The troll under the bridge: Hector plays Jakers, Dannan and Ferni a trick, but they seem not at all it's fun. With help from Don Toro they still manage to see it all from a different point of view.
title: Jakers! Cake batter
